elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Decide on the correct spelling of the missing words in the following text.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: ... The insurance agent could not rule out the possibility that the destruction was intentional.
elements.correctAnswer: The insurance agent could not rule out the possibility that the destruction was intentional.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Decide on the correct spelling of the missing words in the following text.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: The mess ... my neighbors encountered yesterday when they came home was a mystery to us.
elements.correctAnswer: The mess my neighbors encountered yesterday when they came home was a mystery to us.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Decide on the correct spelling of the missing words in the following text.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: My neighbor immediately thought ... vandals were at work.
elements.correctAnswer: My neighbor immediately thought that vandals were at work.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Decide on the correct spelling of the missing words in the following text.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Her husband is of the opinion ... a wild boar has raged here, ... strayed into the garden.
elements.correctAnswer: Her husband is of the opinion that a wild boar has been rampaging through the garden.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Decide on the correct spelling of the missing words in the following text.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In any case, I hope ... the case can be solved soon. ... I am aware that this may still take some time.
elements.correctAnswer: In any case, I hope that the case can be solved soon. I am aware that this may still take some time.
